% -------------------------------------------------------------- % Generated by bibere at {{ site.time | date: '%l:%M %P %Z on %b %-d, %Y' -}}. % -------------------------------------------------------------- {%- assign years = site.data.bibere.papers | group_by_exp: "p", "p[1].year" | sort: "name" | reverse %} {% capture newLine %} {% endcapture %} {%- for year in years -%} {%- for p in year.items -%} {%- assign pid = p[0] -%} {{ newLine }} {%- include bibere/bibtex.html pid=pid mainAuthor=include.mainAuthor -%} {{ newLine }} {%- endfor -%} {%- endfor -%}
